amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike section 139 which establishes an affordable housing fund.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 12 printed in the Congressional Record to strike section 139 pertaining to affordable housing fund.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Bachus amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 148 - 269 (Roll no. 378).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Bachus.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
